LABEL: Dosing Frequency
TRANSFORMATION_LOGIC: QD='QD', BID='BID', TID='TID', QW='QW', Q2W='Q2W', Q3W='Q3W'

LABEL: End Date/Time
NOTES: ISO 8601 format end date (may be missing for ongoing)

LABEL: Study Day of End
NOTES: Study day relative to RFSTDTC (may be missing)

LABEL: Epoch
TRANSFORMATION_LOGIC: IF EXSTDY<0 THEN 'SCREENING' ELSE IF EXSTDY>=1 AND EXSTDY<=84 THEN 'TREATMENT' ELSE 'FOLLOW-UP'
NOTES: Trial epoch derived from study day
